channel.title: Items lost on death - Could someone please help me?
channel.description:
hey guys, I'm trying to make an rsps(525) but I have a slight problem and I was wondering if someone would be kind enough to help me?
Well here's my problem: When the character dies they don't loose any items for some strange reason:/ and I want to add the death emote when the character dies... so if someone could please help me that would be greatly appreciated :(
Thanks. ;)

item.title: Items lost on death - Could someone please help me?
item.dc:creator: @themightydil12 themightydil12
item.description:
@themightydil12 wrote:

TOMSCAPE BETA:

Uhm, I’m not familiar with anything 508 + but can you show your death method? I’m basing this of a 317. I’m sure you have one.

Death method?
an NPC kills me and I spawn @ home? :L
or you want me to show you how I added the interface?

Read full topic
item.source: Items lost on death - Could someone please help me?
